title: In A Landmark First, An AI Program Fools The Turing Test
teaser: In an artificial intelligence breakthrough, a computer program has become the first to pass the Turing Test, according to scholars in England. Designed by Alan Turing, the test is meant to distinguish machines from humans in a series of natural language conversations. This program fooled humans into believing it was a 13-year-old boy.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
